title: Vr-Viz
description: VR-Viz provide a high-level react components to generate 3D visualization in webVR. The open source project can be found on [Github](https://github.com/mustafasaifee42/VR-Viz). Vr-Viz was shorlisted for [Information is Beautiful Award 2019](https://www.informationisbeautifulawards.com/showcase/3884-vr-viz-visualization-system-for-virtual-reality) and is featured in [O'Reily's Creating Augmented and Virtual Realities](http://shop.oreilly.com/product/0636920206767.do).

title: DashboardBot
description: DashboardBot is an algorithm-driven design tool applied to data visualization. It generates variations of designs for dashboard and different graphs.
